home.tagline: Your pocket AI companion that simplifies digital tasks through natural conversation.

unboxing.title: Unboxing Your R1
unboxing.description: Your Rabbit R1 package includes the device, USB-C charging cable, and quick start guide.
unboxing.step1: Remove the R1 from its packaging
unboxing.step2: Charge your device using the included USB-C cable
unboxing.step3: Press and hold the power button to turn on your device

initial_setup.title: Initial Setup
initial_setup.description: Follow these steps to set up your Rabbit R1 for the first time:
initial_setup.step1: Power on your R1 by pressing and holding the power button
initial_setup.step2: Follow the on-screen instructions to connect to Wi-Fi
initial_setup.step3: Create or sign in to your Rabbit account
initial_setup.step5: Your R1 is now ready to use!

basic_controls.title: Basic Controls
basic_controls.power_button: Power Button: Press and hold to turn on/off. Quick press to sleep/wake.
basic_controls.rabbit_button: Rabbit Button: Press and hold to activate voice assistant.
basic_controls.volume: Volume Controls: Use the buttons on the side to adjust volume.
basic_controls.scroll_wheel: Scroll Wheel: Navigate through menus and options.

connecting.title: Connecting to Wi-Fi
connecting.description: A stable internet connection is required for your R1 to function properly.
connecting.step4: Your R1 will automatically connect to this network in the future

language_settings.title: Language Settings
language_settings.note: Changing the language will update the interface language on this guide.
language_settings.translation_description: Your Rabbit R1 supports real-time translation in multiple languages.
